name: Highrail to hell
description:
( Note : Game may not run at the right speed. I'll try and fix it after the jam if possible. If you feel like the browser version is too fast or slow, pls try the windows version and vice versa ) Highrail to hell is a puzzle beat-em-up where you try to get away from a zombie horde while aboard a train.
Controls : C  = Attack X  = Kick  zombies away and give yourself space ( Zombies can only be kicked once their health is red ) Space = Dodge in the direction that you're moving in Left and right arrow key = Movement ( Your objective in a level is given at the top right corner of the screen ) Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
